txt.en: Finish Direnfirel: Guide of the Wooded River-bank.
The milling-camp of Direnfirel is crawling with the enemy. Their number must be thinned for the Rohirrim to have a chance to reclaim the village and its resources.
To weaken the resolve of the invaders within Direnfirel, you take it upon yourself to thin their numbers.
To weaken the resolve of the invaders within Direnfirel, you take it upon yourself to thin their numbers.
You should return to Cwichelm and inform him of your deeds within Direnfirel.
Finish Direnfirel: Guide of the Wooded River-bank

The milling-camp of Direnfirel is crawling with the enemy. Their number must be thinned for the Rohirrim to have a chance to reclaim the village and it's resources.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>Warning: This quest requires Direnfirel: Guide of the Wooded River-bank to be underway in order to access Direnfirel. If that quest has been completed or failed, you will be unable to exit and re-enter Direnfirel in order to complete this quest.</rgb>
'You have done well, [placeholder]. Your efforts should make our reclamation of Direnfirel even easier!'
Direnfirel: Dangers Lurking in the Shade
